Is this the real release and not the same as "Resident.Evil.4.EMUDVD-Unleashed"? Because that version is not the real PC release.

And that version of the game wasent free from errors and stuff. So, is this the Official release of Resident Evil, released by Ubisoft?

Unleashed version IS the real one, I have played it through and it has no errors or bugs, works perfectly. Graphics are crappy, 'coz it's just a simple conversion to pc, just to maximize Capcom's profit.
BOTH: Hatred release and Unleashed release are 100% OK! The difference between the both releases is that the Hatred release is Full DVD release while Unleashed release is EmuDVD release.

You run as fast as you can! then you time it right and push some buttom to jump away from the stone! i use the xbox version then it was enter run. And  jump away from stone on left CTRL.

I have to agree with VilleR2 here. This is just converted console game. Not fun at all playing on PC. I'll rather wait for a real PC version with Mouse support etc comes. 
I'll keep seeding for a while for those who want to give it a try anyways. :)

OK got the game n looks reasonable, thanks kolll. However, anyone any ideas how to set up controls and other game settings?? Am using the normal PC & mouse set up. This dl also has a dll file missing...d3dx9_30.dll which u can find on the net, just in case it happens to u.
The real version was released the 2nd March =/ I've found no torrents with that one. This version doesn't even have lightning ;)
And you should notice if it's the real version, the high res, lightning and stuff

Yes, this is a converted console game and the cutscenes look a bit sour BUT stop being so fucking negative. It's free and that's the bottom line. Wait for the proper release (which has been put off for a year now) or go suck a nut. As for setup just press autoplay and the setupmenu will allow you to change resolution (up to 1600x1200) change between a controller and mosue  support.

Seems Like The Game Crash Everytime Leon Pickes Up His Walky Talky(game.exe), But If I Press ESC And Skip It Everything Works Just Fine. Any1 Who knows how to solve?

Hi, I have hear'd that peoples got stuck when you are in the part is says Press: 5 + 6 or 1 + 3. This is the system... 5 + 6 = (The Run Button) + (Aim Button) 3 + 1 (Aim Button) + (Shoot Button) 1 = (Shoot)
I am not 100% sure if this is right please message me if this didn't work and i will correct.
